I.name: Royal Privilege
description:
{{sbc|Innate:}} '''Qiyana's''' [[basic attack]]s and [[champion ability|basic abilities]] deal {{pp|15 to 83|color=physical damage}} {{as|(+ 45% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}} {{as|'''additional''' physical damage|physical damage}}.

This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.

Gathering an {{as|Element|buzzword}} with {{ai|Terrashape|Qiyana}} {{sti|cdr|resets}} ''Royal Privilege's'' per-target cooldown for enemies affected by ''Royal Privilege'' using a different {{as|Element|buzzword}} (or no {{as|Element|buzzword}}).
I.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Qiyana's basic attacks and champion ability deal 15 âˆ’ 83 (based on level) (+ 45% bonus AD) (+ 30% AP) additional physical damage.

This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.
Gathering an Element with Qiyana's Terrashape resets Royal Privilege's per-target cooldown for enemies affected by Royal Privilege using a different Element (or no Element).
I.notes:
* ''Royal Privilege's'' trigger from a basic attack can be {{tip|blocked}} (bonus damage is negated and the on-target cooldown does not apply).
* ''Royal Privilege'' will not apply a cooldown to targets that are hit with an {{ai|Elemental Wrath|Qiyana}} that has a different {{ai|Terrashape|Qiyana|Element}} than the {{ai|Terrashape|Qiyana|Element}} '''Qiyana''' currently holds.
** This does not occur if a new {{ai|Elemental Wrath|Qiyana}} with a different {{ai|Terrashape|Qiyana|Element}} is cast before the first one lands.
* The effect will not trigger against [[structures]] nor [[ward]]s.
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Royal Privilege's'' interaction with ''parrying'' effects ({{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|blind}}).

Q1.name: Edge of Ixtal
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Qiyana''' slashes forward in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies in a line, reduced to 75% damage against targets beyond the first. ''Edge of Ixtal'' deals 150% damage against {{tip|monsters}}.
Gathering an {{as|Element|buzzword}} with ''{{ai|Terrashape|Qiyana}}'' will {{sti|cdr|reset}} the cooldown and upgrades ''Edge of Ixtal'' into ''Elemental Wrath''.

If cast during ''{{ais|Audacity|Qiyana}}'' dash towards an enemy {{tip|champion}} and the target is within 150 units of '''Qiyana''' at the end of the dash, ''Edge of Ixtal'' will autonomously aim at the target.
Q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Qiyana slashes forward in the target direction, dealing physical damage to enemies in a line, reduced to 75% damage against targets beyond the first. Edge of Ixtal deals 150% damage against monsters.
Gathering an Element with Qiyana's Terrashape will reset the cooldown and upgrades Edge of Ixtal into Elemental Wrath.
If cast during Qiyana's Audacity dash towards an enemy champion and the target is within 150 units of Qiyana at the end of the dash, Edge of Ixtal will autonomously aim at the target.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|50 to 170}} {{as|(+ 75% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Reduced Damage|{{ap|50*0.75 to 170*0.75}} {{as|(+ {{ap|75*0.75}}% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
Q1.notes:
* If cast during {{ai|Audacity|Qiyana}} and the target uses a dash or blink or is no longer in vision, ''Edge of Ixtal'' will aim at the target's last location prior to them starting the dash or blink or being in vision.
{{Effect at cast time end}}

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 75% bonus AD)
  • Reduced Damage: (+ % bonus AD)

Q2.name: Elemental Wrath
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Qiyana''' hurls her blade in the target direction that blasts in a line upon hitting an enemy or maximum range. This consumes the current {{as|Element|buzzword}} to empower the blade with an additional effect.
Enemies hit are dealt ''Edge of Ixtal's'' {{as|physical damage}}, reduced to 75% against subsequent enemies beyond the closest. ''Elemental Wrath'' deals 150% damage against {{tip|monsters}}.

{{sbc|{{as|Brush}}:}} The blade creates a grass field around '''Qiyana''' that lasts for up to 3 seconds, granting her {{tip|invisibility}} and {{sti|ms|{{as|20% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} until she attacks, casts an ability other than ''{{ai|Terrashape|Qiyana}}'', or exits the field.
{{sbc|{{as|River}}:}} The blast {{tip|root|roots}} enemies hit for {{fd|0.5}} seconds, then {{tip|slow|slows}} them by 20% for 1 second.
{{sbc|{{as|Terrain}}:}} The blast deals {{ccs|60% '''bonus''' damage|physical}} against enemies below {{as|50% of their '''maximum''' health}}.
Q2.descriptionHtml:
Active: Qiyana hurls her blade in the target direction that blasts in a line upon hitting an enemy or maximum range. This consumes the current Element to empower the blade with an additional effect.
Enemies hit are dealt Edge of Ixtal's physical damage, reduced to 75% against subsequent enemies beyond the closest. Elemental Wrath deals 150% damage against monsters.
Brush: The blade creates a grass field around Qiyana that lasts for up to 3 seconds, granting her invisibility and 20% bonus movement speed until she attacks, casts an ability other than Qiyana's Terrashape, or exits the field.
River: The blast roots enemies hit for 0.5 seconds, then slows them by 20% for 1 second.
Terrain: The blast deals Unknown value: ccs / 60% bonus damage / physical against enemies below 50% of their maximum health.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|50 to 170}} {{as|(+ 75% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Reduced Damage|{{ap|50*0.75 to 170*0.75}} {{as|(+ {{ap|75*0.75}}% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 75% bonus AD)
  • Reduced Damage: (+ % bonus AD)

• Bonus Damage: (+ % bonus AD)
  • Total Damage: (+ % bonus AD)
  • Total Damage to targets beyond the first: (+ % bonus AD)

st_slices: Total Damage to targets beyond the first

W.name: Terrashape
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} While holding an {{as|Element|buzzword}}, '''Qiyana''' gains {{sti|as|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}}, {{sti|range|25 '''bonus''' attack range}} and {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} on her basic attacks {{tip|on-hit}} and basic abilities. While [[Combat status|out-of-combat]] and moving near the {{as|Element|buzzword}} currently being held, she gains {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Qiyana''' {{tip|dashes}} up to 300 units towards the target location to gather the {{as|Element|buzzword}} of the nearest {{cci|Terrashape Brush.png}} {{sbc|{{as|Brush}}}}, {{cci|Terrashape River.png}} {{sbc|{{as|River}}}} or {{cci|Terrashape Rock.png}} {{sbc|{{as|Terrain}}}} she targeted.
''A target Element is required to cast this ability''.
Once ''Terrashape'' has been learned, '''Qiyana''' is automatically given the {{cci|Terrashape Rock.png}} {{sbc|{{as|Terrain}}}} element upon [[Death|respawning]].
'''Qiyana''' can cast any of her abilities during ''Terrashape''.
W.descriptionHtml:
Passive: While holding an Element, Qiyana gains bonus attack speed, 25 bonus attack range and bonus magic damage on her basic attacks on-hit and basic abilities. While Combat status and moving near the Element currently being held, she gains bonus movement speed.
Active: Qiyana dashes up to 300 units towards the target location to gather the Element of the nearest Unknown value: cci / Terrashape Brush.png Brush, Unknown value: cci / Terrashape River.png River or Unknown value: cci / Terrashape Rock.png Terrain she targeted.
A target Element is required to cast this ability.
Once Terrashape has been learned, Qiyana is automatically given the Unknown value: cci / Terrashape Rock.png Terrain element upon Death.
Qiyana can cast any of her abilities during Terrashape.
W.notes:
* ''Terrashape'' does not interact with [[Terrain#Player-Generated|player-generated terrain]].
* The water puddles formed by the {{ui|Ocean Drake|Ocean Rift}} on {{tip|Summoner's Rift}} count as valid terrain for obtaining the {{cci|Terrashape River.png}} {{sbc|{{as|River}}}} element.
* The {{tip|brush|brushes}} grown by {{cai|Brushmaker|Ivern}} count for gathering the {{cci|Terrashape Brush.png}} {{sbc|{{as|Brush}}}} element.
* Passive bonus damage from basic attacks can be {{tip|blocked}}.
* The passive damage works with {{iis|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} ''Phantom Hit''.
* {{Pending for test}}: Passive bonus damage interaction with ''parrying'' effects ({{tip|dodge}}, {{tip|blind}}).

effects.str:
• Bonus Attack Speed: %
  • Bonus Magic Damage: (+ 10% bonus AD) (+ 45% AP)
  • Bonus Movement Speed: %

E.name: Audacity
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Qiyana''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} a fixed distance towards the target enemy and deals {{as|physical damage}} if they are still in range upon arrival.
'''Qiyana''' can cast any of her abilities during ''Audacity''.
E.descriptionHtml:
Active: Qiyana dashes a fixed distance towards the target enemy and deals physical damage if they are still in range upon arrival.
Qiyana can cast any of her abilities during Audacity.
E.notes: * ''Audacity'' only damages targets if within 250 range at the end of the dash.

R.name: Supreme Display of Talent
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Qiyana''' sweeps a windblast in the target direction that {{tip|airborne|knocks back}} enemies hit, though not through terrain, and stops upon hitting {{sbc|{{as|Terrain}}}}.

The windblast creates a cascading shockwave across any {{sbc|{{as|River}}}} or {{sbc|{{as|Brush}}}} it passes through, as well as around the borders of {{sbc|{{as|Terrain}}}} it reaches, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies hit, with the damage based on the target's health being capped against {{tip|monster|monsters}}.

The shockwave also {{tip|stun|stuns}} enemies hit for {{pp|changedisplay=true|type=proximity|0.5;1|0;X}} seconds, and grants {{tip|sight}} of the area along its path each for {{fd|0.75}} seconds.
R.descriptionHtml:
Active: Qiyana sweeps a windblast in the target direction that knocks back enemies hit, though not through terrain, and stops upon hitting Terrain.
The windblast creates a cascading shockwave across any River or Brush it passes through, as well as around the borders of Terrain it reaches, dealing physical damage to enemies hit, with the damage based on the target's health being capped against monsters.

The shockwave also stuns enemies hit for 0;X â€’ undefined seconds, and grants sight of the area along its path each for 0.75 seconds.
leveling:
{{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|100 to 300}} {{as|(+ 170% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 10% of target's '''maximum''' health)}}}}
{{st|Capped percentage monster damage|{{ap|500 to 1000}}}}
R.notes:
* The windblast needs only to reach near terrain to trigger the terrain shockwave.
* Artificial terrain (e.g, {{cai|Crystallize|Anivia}}, {{cai|Weaver's Wall|Taliyah}}, {{cai|Pillar of Ice|Trundle}}) touching map terrain will be treated as a single piece of terrain, even when bridging two pieces of map terrain together; the shockwave will wrap around all connecting terrain. The shockwave's path is determined once it initially spreads; any expired terrain will be treated as if it were still there.
* {{tip|Projectile|Projectile-intercepting}} effects will block the windblast but not the shockwave.
{{Effect at cast time end}}

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 170% bonus AD) (+ 10% of target's maximum health)
  • Capped percentage monster damage:
